channel.title: Flat Files on opt-models
channel.description: Recent content in Flat Files on opt-models

item.title: Part 02:03 Optimization Toolchain: Data Sources
item.description: Discussing common data sources for optimization models and their various means of connection to the model.

item.title: Optimization Toolchain: User Interfaces
item.description: A look at practical as well as fancy means by which humans can interact with optimization models during development and in production.

item.title: Part 05:05 LEGO® Opt App: Connect Model to Data
item.description: We establish a connection via an import script (written in the AMPL scripting syntax, later to be replaced by a Python script) to a collection of CSV and flat text data files.

item.title: Part 05:07 LEGO® Opt App: Add a Text-based User Interface
item.description: We add a simple but functional, attractive text-based user interface by way of a flat data file formatted for good readability and manual data input.
